actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to exclude veterans education benefits under the Montgomery GI Bill for purposes of determining need analysis for grants to students in attendance at institutions of higher learning.

summary.text: Veterans Education Affordability Act of 2005 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to exclude veterans education benefits under the Montgomery GI Bill in determining need analysis for student assistance under HEA.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to exclude veterans education benefits under the Montgomery GI Bill for purposes of determining need analysis for grants to students in attendance at institutions of higher learning.
